title: Related rates with volume of sand

content.question: Sand is deposited into a pile with a circular base. The volume V of the pile is given by <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>V</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mi>r</mi> <mn>3</mn> </msup> </mrow> <mn>3</mn> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E11@</annotation> </semantics> </math>, where r is the radius of the base, in feet. The circumference of the base is increasing at a constant rate of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>5</mn> <mi>π</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaaiwdacqaHapaCaaa@3B97@</annotation> </semantics> </math> feet per hour. When the circumference of the base is <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>8</mn> <mi>π</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaaiIdacqaHapaCaaa@3B9A@</annotation> </semantics> </math> feet, what is the rate of change of the volume of the pile, in cubic feet per hour?

skill.text: Skill 3.F: Explain the meaning of mathematical solutions in context.
